timeline.message:
Switch Layers to GridPane

Update UI with Gridpane

Implement Layers View State

Adds:
 - New files:
    - LayersViewConcept
    - LayersViewState
    - LayersViewStateAttributeDescription
    - LayersViewStateIOProvider
 - Connect events to save view state

Fix SQ warnings

private contructor added to hide implicit public implementation
Add Layers Tests and rework query language

Add elements to specific layers

Fix invisible graph bug
clean up pane counting

Query rework

 - add toquery test case and reimplement without split usage

Layers context menu improvements

Right click context menu now adds or removes from specific layers
:art: refactored layers view state to use graph listening pattern

Merge branch 'Layers-UI' of https://github.com/constellation-app/constellation into Layers-UI

replies.bodyText: The idea is that in the case of an attribute other than the Vertex/Transaction's bitmask attribute gets updated - it will not trigger another call to update the layer.
